content.question: ​In the polar coordinate system, the point <math alttext="A"><semantics><mi>A</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> has polar coordinates <math alttext="open parentheses 5 comma pi over 4 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following also gives the location of point <math alttext="A"><semantics><mi>A</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> in polar coordinates?

choices.label: ​​<math alttext="open parentheses negative 5 comma fraction numerator 3 pi over denominator 4 end fraction close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses negative 5 comma fraction numerator 5 pi over denominator 4 end fraction close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​<math alttext="open parentheses negative 5 comma fraction numerator 7 pi over denominator 4 end fraction close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>7</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​<math alttext="open parentheses negative 5 comma fraction numerator 9 pi over denominator 4 end fraction close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="open parentheses negative 5 comma fraction numerator 5 pi over denominator 4 end fraction close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
